body: Which one ended up getting impregnated?  They are kinda hard to tell apart.  I thought it was Satomi.
Hmm, i was ab to say, we got a haply ending for the twin, kou really did gods work. But then the epilogue comes...ffs.

What is up with this author and making happy endings to NTR stories... and then making them unhappy again. Like the MC in this almost got both girls exclusively in the end, but then at least one is cheating on him to do porn still (even if she still loves him) - the only upside is that she still likes him the most and is fucking him the most. Still sucks that its not happier though.   >>>Also like the endings this author really likes putting horrible girls that ruin the FMC and MCs life for no logical reason. Fucking stupid.
satona deserved a way harsher ending than what she got.
I think the last one was an alternative ending...
woudlve been decent without that last part... if she was bitchslapped after that last one, then it wouldve been good too
Well kousuke at least got satomi.
it’s somewhere up there with Emergence
i`ve changed my mind Emergence was way less fucked up than this garbage
